column1: You can make a KMD-based chain have any percentage you choose of PoW vs PoS.

column1: 369608312955731968;"Bryan_Beus#6442";"12-Sep-18 01:00 AM";"If you're worried about a lot of miners attacking your chain
column2: and if you want to have people have confirmations that they can at least act on faster
column3: then use a good chunk of PoS in your setup.

column2: having at least some of the PoW method available in your consensus mechanism will allow you to ensure that anyone can mine a block. This curtails censorship
column3: and other issues.

column1: If you're not worried about a time delay
column2: best to keep your chain primarily PoW.";"";"";
